description:
Lavi, with a gunshot wound, barely escapes with her life and heads home to the countryside, where her mother nurses her back to health. There, she learns about the villagers` love for the much-maligned Vlad, her grandfather, and recalls what he said to her about heroes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ho no Kaori ga Michibiku Saiki no Gin
La relève argentée guidée par l`odeur du blé
The Scent of Wheat Ears and the Silver of Revival
穗の香が導く再起の銀
